description:
Accesses the current [theme configuration](https://nextra.site/docs/docs-theme/theme-configuration)
values, excluding layout-specific elements like:
- `footer`
- `navbar`
- `pageMap`
- `nextThemes`
- `banner`
- `children`

This hook is useful for dynamically configuring your project based on shared theme values.
name: useThemeConfig

returns.name: editLink
returns.type: string | number | bigint | boolean | ReactElement<unknown, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | Iterable<ReactNode> | ReactPortal | Promise<...> | null

returns.name: feedback.content
returns.type: string | number | bigint | boolean | ReactElement<unknown, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | Iterable<ReactNode> | ReactPortal | Promise<...> | null

returns.name: search
returns.type: string | number | bigint | boolean | ReactElement<unknown, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | Iterable<ReactNode> | ReactPortal | Promise<...> | null

returns.name: toc.backToTop
returns.type: string | number | bigint | boolean | ReactElement<unknown, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | Iterable<ReactNode> | ReactPortal | Promise<...> | null

returns.name: toc.title
returns.type: string | number | bigint | boolean | ReactElement<unknown, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | Iterable<ReactNode> | ReactPortal | Promise<...> | null

tags.returns: A subset of your theme configuration context.
